name: Thomas F. Malone, Haunted Police Detective
text: Heroic. Response: After resolving a story to which Thomas F. Malone is committed, choose and destroy an opponent's Villainous or Cultist character that was committed to that story.

name: Kirby O'Donnell, Adventurer Abroad
text: Heroic. While Kirby O'Donnell is committed to a story, each Heroic character gains C and each Villainous character loses T.

name: Local Sheriff
text: Willpower. Action: Pay 1 to return Local Sheriff to your hand if it entered your discard pile this phase.

name: Paul LeMond, Tormented Psychic
text: Action: Pay 1 to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, Paul LeMond gains all of that character's printed icons.

name: Professor Hermann Mulder, Bureau Consultant
text: Professor Hermann Mulder goes insane at any time there are 6 or more characters in play.

name: Monster Hunter
text: Response: After you win an icon struggle by at least 2 icons, pay 2 to choose and wound a character with skill 2 or lower.

name: Undercover Security
text: Heroic. Willpower.

name: Hired Muscle
text: Toughness +1.

name: Freelance Occultist
text: Fast.

name: Peeler
text: Peeler gains Willpower while there is at least 1 Attachment card in play.

name: T-Men
text: Forced Response: After T-Men enters play, choose and wound a character.

name: G-Men
text: Heroic. Toughness +3. Willpower.

name: Shotgun
text: Attach to a character. While attached character is committed to a story, it gains "Action: Pay 1 to choose and wound a character committed to this story."

name: Patrol Wagon
text: Attach to a character. Attached character gains Toughness +1. Disrupt: Pay 2 to cancel 1 wound to attached character.

name: Shotgun Blast
text: Action: Choose and wound a character with skill X or lower.

name: Short Fuse
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose a character. Give that character 7 wounds.

name: Torch the Joint!
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose and destroy a non-[Agency] resource or a Location support card.

name: Small Price to Pay
text: Action: Choose a character you control and a character an opponent controls. Choose one of those characters to go insane, then wound the other character.

name: Working a Hunch
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains CC. If you overpaid for Working a Hunch, the chosen character also gains AI.

name: Professor Albert Wilmarth, Folklore Expert
text: Heroic. While Professor Albert Wilmarth is committed to a story, that story card loses an icon struggle of your choice.

name: Dr. Ali Kafour, Middle Eastern Scholar
text: Heroic. Response: After you commit Dr. Ali Kafour to a story, draw a card.

name: Steve Clarney, Soldier of Fortune
text: Heroic. Willpower. While Steve Clarney is committed to a story, all characters lose all Toughness.

name: Professor Nathaniel Peaslee, Scholar of the Arcane
text: Response: After Professor Nathaniel Peaslee enters your discard pile from play, pay 2 to put into play all characters that entered a discard pile this phase.

name: Anthropology Advisor
text: Lower the cost for you to play Investigator characters by 1. Investigator characters you control gain I.

name: Visiting Author
text: Action: Pay 1 to return Visiting Author to your hand if it entered your discard pile this phase.

name: Mad Genius
text: Response: After Mad Genius is restored, choose a story card. Put 1 success token on that story card.

name: Strange Librarian
text: Action: Exhaust Strange Librarian to look at the top 3 cards of any player’s deck. Put one of those cards on the bottom of his deck, and the other two back on top in any order.

name: Itinerant Scholar
text: Action: Sacrifice Itinerant Scholar to move a drain token from one of your domains to an undrained domain.

name: Natural Philosopher
text: Forced Response: After Natural Philosopher enters play, draw a card. Then, each player chooses and discards a card from his hand.

name: Student Archaeologist
text: Response: After Student Archaeologist is restored, draw a card. Then, each player chooses and discards a card from his hand.

name: Celano Fragments, The Life's Work of Dr. Shrewsbury
text: Action: Exhaust and pay X to choose a committed character with cost X or lower. Remove that character from the story.

name: Open for Inspection
text: Attach to a story card. Attached story gains:

name: Atwood Science Hall
text: Characters you control get +1 skill for each I icon they have.

name: Binding
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all of its printed icons.

name: Feast of Famine
text: Action: Draw 2 cards. Then, each player must choose and discard a card from his hand.

name: Restless and Wary
text: Action: Ready all exhausted characters.

name: Dr. Carson's Treatment
text: Action: Choose up to 2 insane characters. Restore and ready those characters. If you overpaid for Dr. Carson's Treatment, those characters gain CC until the end of the phase.

name: Unearthing the Ancients
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Draw 3 cards.

name: Cthulhu, The Great Old One
text: Villainous. Invulnerability. Forced Response: After a player draws cards during his draw phase, he must sacrifice a character, if able.

name: Dagon, Father of the Deep
text: Villainous. Invulnerability. Disrupt: Pay 1 and sacrifice a Deep One character to cancel the effects of an event card that would destroy Dagon.

name: Keeper of the Golden Path
text: Villainous.

name: Guardian Shoggoth
text: Toughness +2.

name: Shadow-spawned Hunting Horror
text: While Shadow-spawned Hunting Horror is committed to a story, each committed character loses an I icon.

name: Ravager from the Deep
text: Villainous. Toughness +1. Forced Response: After Ravager from the Deep is committed to a story, wound all other characters at that story.

name: Innsmouth Troublemaker
text: Toughness +1.

name: Adult Deep One
text: Disrupt: Pay 2 to cancel a card effect that chooses Adult Deep One as a target.

name: Ocean Crawlers
text: Ocean Crawlers gets +1 skill for each Attachment in play.

name: Lord of the Silver Twilight
text: Lower the cost to play Cthulhu by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Mature Deep One
text: Action: Pay 3 to choose and destroy an Attachment card.

name: Sleep of Reason
text: Attach to a story card. Attached story gains:

name: Sword of Y'ha-tallo
text: Attach to a character. Attached character gains TC.

name: Shadowed Reef
text: Deep One characters gain a T icon.

name: Deep One Assault
text: Loyal. Action: Choose and destroy a character or support card with cost X or lower.

name: Pulled Under
text: Action: Exhaust a character with at least 2 T icons to choose and destroy an exhausted non-Ancient One character.

name: Get it Off!
text: Action: Choose and destroy an Attachment card.

name: Sacrificial Offerings
text: Action: Choose and wound a character controlled by an opponent. Then, that character's controller may choose and wound a character.

name: Touched by the Sleeper
text: Action: Choose a [Cthulhu] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains TT.

name: Jack "Brass" Brady, Steeped in Violence
text: Disrupt: Before a triggered ability resolves, return Jack "Brass" Brady to his owner's hand.

name: Dr. Marinus Bicknell Willett, Lost but Determined
text: Fast. Willpower.

name: Richard Upton Pickman, Genius Painter
text: Action: Pay 2 to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, Richard Upton Pickman gains that character's keywords and triggered abilities. Then, treat that character as though its printed text box were blank until the end of the phase.

name: Bag Man
text: Fast.

name: Clover Club Bouncer
text: Action: Exhaust to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 skill.

name: Clover Club Torch Singer
text: Action: Pay 1 to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 skill.

name: Triggerman
text: Loyal. Willpower.

name: Syndicate Liaison
text: Forced Response: After Syndicate Liaison enters play, choose and exhaust a ready character, if able.

name: Hard Case
text: Response: After Hard Case enters play, choose and exhaust a character with printed cost X or lower. X is the number of domains you control.

name: Patsy
text: Action: Sacrifice Patsy to discard exactly 2 success tokens from a story with 4 or fewer total success tokens.

name: Extortionist
text: Response: After Extortionist enters play from your hand, if you overpaid for Extortionist, choose and exhaust a non-Ancient One character.

name: Freelance Photographer
text: Action: Pay 1 to ready Freelance Photographer.

name: Dutch Courage
text: Characters you control gain Toughness +1.

name: Cathouse
text: Response: After you overpay for a triggered ability, choose and ready a character.

name: Alhazred Lamp
text: Attach to a character. Attached character gains TCAI.

name: Like a Moth
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, lower that character's printed skill to 0.

name: Panic
text: Loyal. Action: Exhaust all characters with skill lower than X.

name: Get On Yer Feet!
text: Action: Choose and ready a character. If you overpaid for Get On Yer Feet!, that character gets +3 skill until the end of the phase.

name: Low Blow
text: Action: Choose a character. If that character is ready, exhaust it. If it is exhausted, it goes insane.

name: Legacy of Ramses
text: Action: Choose and ready an exhausted character. Then, you may drain a domain you control to return Legacy of Ramses to your hand instead of discarding it.

name: Hastur, The King in Yellow
text: Villainous. Toughness +4. Action: Pay 3 to choose a character. That character goes insane.

name: Victoria Glasser, The Society Hostess
text: Villainous. Forced Response: After Victoria Glasser enters play, choose a character. That character goes insane.

name: Yellow Muse
text: Fast. While Yellow Muse is committed to a story, all other characters committed to the same story lose Fast.

name: Demon Lover
text: Action: Exhaust to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 skill.

name: Thing from the Stars
text: Lower the cost to play Thing from the Stars by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for each resource type other than [Hastur] attached to the domain drained to pay for Thing from the Stars. Action: Exhaust to choose and destroy an insane character.

name: Messenger from Beyond
text: Action: Exhaust to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a T icon.

name: Performance Artist
text: Disrupt: Sacrifice Performance Artist to cancel the effects of a character or support card ability.

name: Byakhee Servant
text: Fast.

name: Predatory Byakhee
text: Action: Sacrifice Predatory Byakhee to discard the top 3 cards from an opponent's deck.

name: Bearer of the Yellow Sign
text: Response: After Bearer of the Yellow Sign enters play from your hand, if you overpaid for Bearer of the Yellow Sign, choose a character. That character goes insane.

name: Ghost
text: While Ghost is committed to a story, it gains Invulnerability.

name: Victoria's Loft
text: During the refresh phase, insane characters cannot be restored.

name: Sedated
text: Attach to an insane character. Attached character cannot be restored.

name: Byakhee Attack
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from his hand, if able.

name: Agoraphobia
text: Action: Choose a character without any T icons. Return that character to its owner’s hand.

name: Scotophobia
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each character controlled by an opponent loses all of its printed T icons.

name: Despair
text: Response: After you win an icon struggle by at least 2 icons, choose a character without any Attachment cards on it. Return that character to its owner's hand.

name: Blind Submission
text: Action: Choose a character with skill 2 or lower. Until the end of the phase, take control of that character.

name: Power Drain
text: Disrupt: Cancel an Action or Response just played or used.

name: Yog-Sothoth, In Whom the Spheres Meet
text: Villainous. Invulnerability. Lower the cost to play Yog-Sothoth by 1 for each Spell card in your discard pile (to a minimum of 1).

name: Servant from Out of Time
text: Forced Response: After Servant from Out of Time enters play, sacrifice a resource from one of your domains, if able.

name: Son of Yeb
text: Son of Yeb gains C for each Cultist character you control.

name: Living Mummy
text: Forced Response: After Living Mummy enters your discard pile from play, wound all characters.

name: Fishers from Outside
text: Forced Response: After Fishers from Outside enters play, choose an exhausted character. Return that character to its owner's hand.

name: Cannibal Ghast
text: Cannibal Ghast cannot commit to stories on your turn.

name: Spell-bound Shoggoth
text: All other characters get -1 skill.

name: Arcane Initiate
text: Villainous. Willpower.

name: Guardian Elder Thing
text: Toughness +2. While Guardian Elder Thing is committed to a story, it gains: "Action: Pay 2 to wound all characters committed to this story."

name: Hound of Tindalos
text: Fast. Action: Attach Hound of Tindalos to a character. While Hound of Tindalos is attached, attached character gets -4 skill. Action: pay 1 to unattach Hound of Tindalos.

name: Disciple of the Gate
text: Villainous. X is at all times equal to the number of [Yog-Sothoth] characters in play.

name: Forbidden Shrine
text: Your characters get +1 skill while committed to a story.

name: Blackmoor Estate
text: Action: Exhaust and pay X to discard the top X cards of a player’s deck.

name: Journey to the Other Side
text: Action: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, then put them back in any order. If you overpaid for Journey to the Other Side, you may put one of those cards into your hand.

name: Opening the Limbo Gate
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose and put into play one character from each player's discard pile.

name: A Single Glimpse
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose an opponent. That opponent must sacrifice a character, if able.

name: Gathering at the Stones
text: Play during your operations phase. Action: Choose a card in your discard pile and put it into your hand.

name: Unspeakable Resurrection
text: Action: Choose a character in your discard pile with cost X or lower. Put that character into play.

name: Dampen Light
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, raise the cost to play cards by 1.

name: Shub-Niggurath, The All Mother
text: Villainous. Invulnerability. Action: Pay 3 to search your deck for a Dark Young character and put that character into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Y'Golonac, The Obscenity
text: Villainous. Invulnerability. Action: Pay 1 to choose and ready a character. That character must commit to the same story as Y'Golonac, if able.

name: Priestess of Bubastis
text: Action: Exhaust to lower the cost of the next [Shub-Niggurath] character you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Slavering Gug
text: Action: Pay 4 to choose and wound a character.

name: Forest Sister
text: Disrupt: Pay 1 to cancel a wound to Forest Sister.

name: Ancient Guardian
text: Action: Pay 1 to choose and ready an exhausted character or support card you control.

name: Small Ghouls
text: Forced Response: After Small Ghouls enters play, put 3 cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order, if able.

name: Watcher of the Woods
text: Watcher of the Woods enters play exhausted if you control no support cards.

name: Mi-Go Scout
text: All Mi-Go characters gain an I icon.

name: Mi-Go Warrior
text: Disrupt: Exhaust to cancel 1 wound to a character.

name: Hungry Dark Young
text: Response: After Hungry Dark Young enters play, put into play from your hand or discard pile a character with printed cost 2 or lower.

name: Shadowed Woods
text: Response: After you play a [Shub-Niggurath] character from your hand, pay X to choose and return a character with cost X or lower from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Ghoul Taint
text: Attach to a character. Attached character cannot commit to a story on its controller's turn.

name: Altar of the Blessed
text: Characters you control get +1 skill.

name: Regeneration
text: Disrupt: Cancel 1 wound to a character you control.

name: Burrowing Beneath
text: Action: Choose and destroy a support card.

name: Horrid Mutation
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, each committed character you control gains a T icon.

name: Bred to Survive
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, your characters gain Invulnerability.

name: Shocking Transformation
text: Action: Sacrifice one of your characters to search your deck for a non-Ancient One character and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Mystic Bounty Hunter
text: Action: Sacrifice Mystic Bounty Hunter to return to their owners' hands all Attachment cards in all discard piles.

name: Freelance Agent
text: Fast. While Freelance Agent is committed to a story, it gains CC for each character with lower skill committed by your opponents.

name: .45 Pistols
text: Attach to a character. Attached character gains a C icon.

name: Political Demonstration
text: Response: After you win an icon struggle by at least 2 icons, choose and destroy a support card.

name: Overzealous Initiate
text: Action: Sacrifice Overzealous Initiate to put the top card of your deck into play, face down, as a domain.

name: Arkham Asylum
text: Action: Pay 1 to choose an insane character. Restore and ready that character.

name: Moving the Scenery
text: Response: After you win an icon struggle by at least 2 icons, move a success token from one side of a story to another.

name: Military Advisor
text: Toughness +2. Response: After Military Advisor is wounded, pay 2 to choose and wound a character with skill lower than Military Advisor.

name: Serpent from Yoth
text: Forced Response: After Serpent from Yoth enters your discard pile, each opponent must choose and sacrifice a character.

name: Tcho-Tcho Talisman
text: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains TT. Response: After Tcho-Tcho Talisman is placed into any discard pile from play, pay 1 to return it to its owner's hand.

name: Inside Information
text: Action: Choose a story. Until the end of the phase, that story loses a struggle icon of your choice.

name: Dabbler in the Unknown
text: Action: Sacrifice Dabbler in the Unknown to put a success token on a story card with no success tokens.

name: Gentleman's Club
text: Action: Exhaust and pay 2 to draw a card.

name: Eldritch Nexus
text: Action: Gain a Domain, then attach the top card of your deck to it as a resource.

name: The Bootleg Whiskey Cover-Up
text: Treat all characters committed to this story as if their text boxes were blank.

name: Government Exorcist
text: Response: After Government Exorcist commits to a story on your turn, choose an opponent's character with a T icon. That character cannot commit to the same story as Government Exorcist.

name: Interrogation Center
text: Neutral characters cannot commit to stories.

name: Dr. Carson, Fringe Psychologist
text: Action: Exhaust Dr. Carson to restore and ready an insane character.

name: Rabbit's Foot
text: Attach to a [Miskatonic] character. Response: After attached character commits to a story, reveal the top card of your deck, then put that card into your hand. If the revealed card was a character card, C struggles do not resolve at that story this phase.

name: Sleeping Pills
text: Attach to a non-Ancient One character. While attached character is committed to a story, T struggles do not resolve at that story.

name: Trent Dixon, Workaholic
text: If Trent Dixon is able to commit to a story, he must commit to a story. If Trent Dixon is the only character you control that is committed to a story, count his skill and icons to all other story cards as well.

name: Underground Asylum
text: Disrupt: Exhaust Underground Asylum and pay 1 to cancel an effect that would cause a character to go insane.

name: Emerging Deep One
text: Forced Response: After you play Emerging Deep One from your hand, choose and destroy a [Cthulhu] character.

name: Called by Azathoth
text: Attach to a character. Treat attached character as if its printed text box were blank.

name: Erich Zann, Strange Virtuoso
text: If you win a T struggle in which Erich Zann is participating, instead of the normal struggle effects, you choose which of your opponent's participating characters goes insane.

name: Spawn of the Sleeper
text: Action: Choose a character that has gone insane as the result of a T struggle this phase. Take control of that character.

name: Terrifying Visage
text: Attach to a character with a T icon. Response: After you win a T struggle, ready attached character.

name: Bloodthirsty Zealot
text: While there is at least one insane character in play, Bloodthirsty Zealot gains CC.

name: Touched with Madness
text: Play during your story phase. Action: For each T struggle that you win this phase, instead of the normal struggle effect, you choose which of your opponent's participating characters goes insane.

name: Grim Wraith
text: Response: After Grim Wraith commits to a story, choose an icon struggle at that story. Instead of resolving that struggle, resolve an additional T struggle in its place.

name: The Black Goat's Rage
text: Play only if every card you control has the [Shub-Niggurath] faction. Action: Each player counts the T icons on all readied characters he controls. The player who counts the fewest T icons must immediately chose two characters he controls to go insane, if able.

name: Julia Brown, Insomniac
text: Julia Brown gains +1 skill for each insane character in play. Disrupt: If Julia Brown would go insane as the result of a T struggle, sacrifice her instead. Then, search your deck for a card titled "Julia Brown" or "The Sleepwalker", put it into play committed to the same story, and then shuffle your deck.

name: Those Without Faces
text: Disrupt: After you win a T struggle, the loser of the struggle discards a card from the top of his deck.

name: Sleepless Nights
text: Play during your story phase, before characters are committed to stories. Action: Resolve an additional T struggle at all stories this phase.

name: The Underwater Conspiracy
text: If you win this conspiracy, you may cause all characters in play to lose Willpower and then go insane, if able.

name: Marshall Greene, Too Old For This
text: Heroic. Toughness +1. Willpower. While Marshall Greene does not have any wounds, all of your characters committed to the same story as Marshall Greene gain Willpower.

name: Hand Restraints
text: Attach to a character. Attached character loses CI.

name: Hapless Graduate Student
text: If you would draw a card, you may choose not to draw a card. Forced Response: After you draw a card, Hapless Graduate Student goes insane.

name: Scholarly Plagiarist
text: If you win an I struggle in which Scholarly Plagiarist is participating, instead of the normal struggle effects, move a success token from the opponent's side of the story to yours.

name: Chess Prodigy
text: Fast. When Chess Prodigy commits to a story on your turn, name a struggle type. Resolve that struggle type at that story by counting I icons instead of that struggle type's normal icons at that story this phase. The normal struggle effects still apply.

name: Fugitive Scientist
text: Characters without an I icon committed to the same story as Fugitive Scientist do not count their skill.

name: Vengeful Hit
text: Disrupt: After you lose an I struggle, choose a character with an I icon, remove that character from the story it is committed to, then exhaust it if it is not already exhausted.

name: Arkham Advertiser Archives
text: Response: After you win an I struggle, exhaust Arkham Advertiser Archives to refresh 1 of your domains with 2 or fewer resources attached.

name: Silver Twilight Temptress
text: Response: After Silver Twilight Temptress is committed to a story on your turn, choose a character without an I icon. That character must commit to the same story as Silver Twilight Temptress, if able.

name: A Single Path
text: Play during the story phase before any characters are committed to stories. Action: Each player can only commit characters to a single story this phase.

name: Wandering Inmate
text: Response: After an insane character is restored, exhaust Wandering Inmate to return that character to its owner's hand unless its owner pays the printed cost of that character.

name: Local Brew
text: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains Fast, and all of your characters committed to the same story as attached character gain Fast.

name: Unfathomable Elder Thing
text: Response: After Unfathomable Elder Thing commits to a story, choose an opponent’s character with an I icon. That character cannot commit to the same story as Unfathomable Elder Thing.

name: Book of Eibon, Mind Bending Revelations
text: Attach to a character. Attached character’s controller cannot have more than 5 cards in his hand. If that player has more than 5 cards in hand, that player must choose and discard cards from his hand until 5 cards remain.

name: Mind Eater
text: Action: Pay 1 to choose a character with an I icon. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an I icon and Mind Eater gains an I icon.

name: Under the Porch
text: Action: Sacrifice Under the Porch to search your deck for a [Shub-Niggurath] character, and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, return that character to its owner’s hand.

name: Tithe Collector
text: Forced Response: After a player plays a card, raise the cost for that player to play cards by 1 until the end of the phase.

name: Beneath the Surface, Eureka!
text: Play during your story phase, before characters are committed. Action: Choose a story. Until the end of the phase, if you win an I struggle by at least 3 icons at that story, win that story immediately.

name: With a Fine Toothed Comb
text: Play during your story phase, before characters are committed to stories. Action: Resolve an additional I struggle at all stories this phase.

name: The Endless Investigation
text: If you win this conspiracy, you may search your deck for any conspiracy card and put it into play, if able. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Repo Man
text: If you win a C struggle at a story to which Repo Man is committed, instead of the normal struggle effects, take control of a support card controlled by the losing player.

name: Dynamite
text: Attach to an [Agency] character. Action: Discard Dynamite from play to wound all characters committed to the same story as attached character.

name: Howard Ludvinski, Visiting Artist
text: Action: Trigger a non-conspiracy story card in your won story pile. Shuffle it back into the story deck before its effect resolves.

name: Academic Obfuscation
text: Attach to a story card. Opponents need 2 additional success tokens to win attached story.

name: Brazen Hoodlum
text: Characters without a C icon committed to the same story as Brazen Hoodlum do not count their skill.

name: Blackball Jim, Pool Hustler
text: Response: After you succeed at a story to which Blackball Jim is committed, drain one of your domains to drain an opponent's domain. If your domain has more resources attached than your opponent's, place an additional success token on that story.

name: Vengeful Mob
text: Response: After you lose a C struggle, choose an opponent's character. If that character has fewer C icons than all of your characters that are not committed to a story, wound the target character.

name: Nocturnal Scavenger
text: Response: After you win a C struggle, pay X to choose and destroy an attachment card with printed cost X or lower.

name: Muddy Waters
text: Response: After a character enters a discard pile, exhaust Muddy Waters to exhaust a character.

name: Long-Dead Prince, Ancient Royalty
text: Toughness +1. Action: If Long Dead Prince is wounded, return him to his owner's hand.

name: Infernal Obsession
text: Attach to a non-Ancient One character. While attached, you gain control of attached character. (If control changes again, discard Infernal Obsession from play.)

name: The Sleepwalker, Trapped by Nightmare
text: Response: After The Sleepwalker commits to a story, choose an opponent's character with a C icon. That character cannot commit to the same story as The Sleepwalker.

name: Across Dimensions
text: Play only if every character you control has the [Yog-Sothoth] faction. Action: Until the end of the phase, each [Yog-Sothoth] character gains X C icons, where X is the number of [Yog-Sothoth] characters in play.

name: Gibbering Soul
text: Response: After Gibbering Soul is destroyed, search your deck for a [Shub-Niggurath] character with a C icon, reveal it, and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Ghoulish Thrill Seeker
text: Response: After a character is wounded, ready Ghoulish Thrill Seeker.

name: Eat the Dead
text: Attach to a character you control. Response: When attached character is destroyed, attach it and Eat the Dead to any domain you control as resources.

name: The Cornered Man, "Like an Animal"
text: Toughness +2. Heroic. Disrupt: After you win a C struggle in which The Cornered Man participated, wound The Cornered Man to immediately resolve another C struggle at that story.

name: Secret Stiletto
text: Attach to a character you control. Disrupt: After you win a C struggle by at least 3 icons at a story to which attached character is committed, pay 2 to choose and wound a character controlled by the losing opponent.

name: Antediluvian Dreams
text: Play during your story phase, before characters are committed to stories. Action: Resolve an additional C struggle at all stories this phase.

name: Ask Questions Later
text: If you win this conspiracy, you may wound all characters in play.

name: Agency Groundskeeper
text: Action: Exhaust Agency Groundskeeper to choose and exhaust a support card. If that card is a Location, destroy it.

name: A Call for Help
text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with an A icon to search your deck for an [Agency] character and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

name: Shortsighted Librarian
text: Response: After you win an A struggle, look at the top card of any player's deck. You may put this card on the top of the deck, on the bottom of the deck, or in its owner's discard pile.

name: Pagan Hall, Science Department
text: Disrupt: If you would place a success token at a story, exhaust Pagan Hall to instead place that success token on Pagan Hall. Action: Exhaust Pagan Hall to move any number of success tokens from it to a story of your choice.

name: Arcane Grifter
text: Characters without an A icon committed to the same story as Arcane Grifter do not count their skill.

name: Midnight Alley, No Shelter from the Storm
text: Response: After you lose an A struggle, sacrifice Midnight Alley to choose an opponent. That player must choose one of his domains, then exchange the cards in his hand with the resources attached to that domain.

name: The Terror of the Tides
text: Toughness +5. Action: Pay 3 to put The Terror of the Tides into play from your hand. Then, give The Terror of the Tides 4 wounds.

name: Bite Marks
text: Attach to a character. Response: After attached character is wounded, destroy that character.

name: Stealthy Byakhee
text: Response: After Stealthy Byakhee commits to a story, choose an opponent's character with an A icon. That character cannot commit to the same story as Stealthy Byakhee.

name: Coffee House
text: Response: After you win an A struggle by at least 2 icons, sacrifice Coffee House to ready all characters you control.

name: Shadow Sorceress
text: Response: After you win an A struggle in which Shadow Sorceress participated, return the topmost Spell card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Path of Blood
text: Action: Choose a neutral character in play. Return that character to its owner's hand.

name: Dimensional Worm
text: Response: After Dimensional Worm commits to a story as the attacker, choose a struggle at that story. Resolve that struggle by counting A icons instead of its regular icons. The effect of the struggle does not change.

name: Summoning Circle
text: Action: Exhaust Summoning Circle and any number of [Shub-Niggurath] characters with X total A icons to search your deck for a [Shub-Niggurath] character with cost X or lower, reveal it, and put it into your hand. (X is the number of A icons on the characters exhausted for the cost).

name: Descendant of Eibon, Master of the Black Arts
text: Willpower. Fast. Action: Discard 2 of your success tokens to put Descendant of Eibon into play from your hand or into your hand from your discard pile. At the end of the phase, if he is still in play from this effect, return Descendant of Eibon to your hand.

name: Clever Zoog
text: Other characters you control at the same story as Clever Zoog gain A.

name: Struggling Artist
text: A struggles are resolved first at any story to which Struggling Artist is committed. Disrupt: After you win an A struggle in which Struggling Artist participated, choose a struggle at that story. Skip that struggle at this story this turn.

name: Total Eclipse
text: Play during your story phase, before characters are committed to stories. Action: Resolve an additional A struggle at all stories this phase.

name: Stealing the Glory
text: Action: Choose a story. Until the end of the phase, you may place 1 success token on that story for each A struggle you win at that story.

name: Fountain of Youth
text: If you win this conspiracy, you may restore and ready all characters in play.

name: Unorthodox Psychologist
text: Action: Exhaust Unorthodox Psychologist to look at an opponent's hand.

name: Endless Interrogation
text: Response: After you succeed at a story, discard a card at random from each opponent's hand. Then, you may pay 1 to return Endless Interrogation to your hand instead of discarding it.

name: Literature Professor
text: While every card you control has the [Miskatonic] faction, Literature Professor gains: "Disrupt: After you win a story card, you may search the story deck to choose the next story card (from the story deck) to come into the game. (Shuffle the story deck when you are done.)"

name: Summer Classes
text: Action: Choose a character that is currently committed to a story. That character remains committed when that story resolves this phase, unless the story is won. That character cannot un-commit until that story resolves again.

name: Friend of the Family
text: When Friend of the Family is committed to a story, each character controlled by an opponent committed to the same story gets -1 skill.

name: Tear Gas
text: Action: Attach Tear Gas to a character. Tear Gas gains the Attachment subtype and the text: "Attached character gets -1 skill, and is destroyed if its skill is 0."

name: The Thing from the Shore
text: Toughness +3. Response: When you succeed at a story in which The Thing from the Shore participated, remove all wound tokens from The Thing from the Shore.

name: Communal Shower
text: Players cannot commit characters they control from different factions to the same story.

name: Shadow Company, Ghastly Regiment
text: X is the number of [Hastur] characters you control. Response: After you succeed at a story to which Shadow Company is committed alone, choose an opponent's character with lower skill than Shadow Company and return it to its owner's hand.

name: Vaporous Isle
text: While Vaporous Isle is ready, any character that would go insane is instead returned to its owner's hand. Forced Response: If an opponent succeeds at a story, exhaust Vaporous Isle.

name: Nebulous Ooze
text: Action: Pay 1 to remove Nebulous Ooze from a story to which it is committed and commit a ready [Yog-Sothoth] character you control to that story, without exhausting that character.

name: Domestic Sacrifice
text: Action: Discard the top 2 cards of any deck. You may choose and ready a [Yog-Sothoth] character for each [Yog-Sothoth] card discarded in this way.

name: Insect Swarm
text: Fast. The cost for all players to play neutral cards is increased by 1.

name: Open Grave
text: Response: After a character you control is destroyed, sacrifice Open Grave to put into play from your discard pile a [Shub-Niggurath] character with skill 3 or lower.

name: Campaign Chief
text: Raise the cost to play all cards with printed cost 2 or lower by 1.

name: Samantha Grace, Incompetent Secretary
text: Each player needs an additional story card in order to win the game.

name: Obsessive Inmate
text: Willpower. Obsessive Inmate does not un-commit from a story until that story is won.

name: Parallel Universe
text: Action: Pay 1 to attach Parallel Universe from your hand to a story card. When resolving struggles at attached story, count the total skill of all participating characters instead of the icons to determine the winner of each struggle.

name: The Spawn of Madness
text: Response: After you succeed at a story in which you were opposed, refresh all domains in play.

name: Unorthodox Tactics
text: Resolve the skill comparison at this conspiracy before any of its struggles occur. If you win this conspiracy before any struggles occur, you may choose which of its struggles resolve.

name: Confident Rookie
text: While Confident Rookie has a Weapon card attached, it gains C and Willpower. While Confident Rookie has a Vehicle card attached, it gains A and Fast.

name: Military Bike
text: Attach to a character you control. Disrupt: After a story to which attached character is committed resolves, exhaust Military Bike to immediately re-commit attached character to another unresolved story.

name: Field Researcher
text: Response: After an opponent wins a story but chooses not to trigger its effect, exhaust Field Researcher to trigger that story's effect as if you had won the story.(It still goes to the winning opponent's won story pile.)

name: Changing the Names
text: Action: Exchange all success tokens controlled by any 1 player at 2 different stories.

name: Expendable Muscle
text: If Expendable Muscle would be wounded or go insane, instead attach it to a character you control. Then, Expendable Muscle becomes an Attachment support card with the text: "Attached character gains Toughness +1 and Willpower."

name: False Papers
text: Attach to a character. Action: Exhaust False Papers to give attached character a Subtype of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Julia Brown, Oddly Amphibious
text: Forced Response: After Julia Brown commits to a story, discard 2 cards at random from your hand, then draw 2 cards.

name: Eye of the Deep
text: Action: Choose every character in play with printed skill 3 or lower. Those characters are considered 1 skill characters with no abilities and CCA until the end of the phase.

name: Scalethorn Asylum, Amphibious Fort
text: Action: Exhaust Scalethorn Asylum and pay 1 to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the Deep One subtype and CCA.

name: The Thing Behind You, Turn around!
text: Fast. Action: Pay 2 and return a [Hastur] character to your hand to put The Thing Behind You into play from your hand.

name: Brain Transplant
text: Action: Choose an insane character and a ready character controlled by the same player. The ready character goes insane, if able. Then, restore and ready the targeted insane character.

name: Hideous Guardian
text: Toughness +5. Disrupt: Before another character you control is wounded, place the wound token(s) on Hideous Guardian instead of on the wounded character.

name: Idol of the Abomination
text: Action: Pay 2 to turn Idol of the Abomination into a character with TTCC and 3 skill until the end of the phase.

name: Binding Worm
text: Characters cannot commit to stories alone.

name: Unspeakable Transformation
text: Action: Choose a character you control with cost 3 or lower. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the icons of any other character you control.

name: Old Sea Dog
text: Action: Exhaust Old Sea Dog to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses all faction affiliations and becomes neutral.

name: Conspiracy Theorist
text: Players cannot win the game by winning story cards unless at least one of their won story cards is also a conspiracy card, or unless there are no story cards left in the story deck.

name: Strange Delusions
text: Attach to a character or support card. Action: Exhaust Strange Delusions to give attached card a faction affiliation of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Foiled!
text: Attach to a story card. Treat attached story as if its text box were blank.

name: The Path to Y'ha-nthlei
text: If you win this conspiracy, you may trigger the effect of any story card currently in play.

name: Night-shift Security
text: Toughness +1. If it is Night, each character you control cannot be chosen as the only target of an event card.

name: Flood Lights
text: Raise the cost for opponents to play Night cards by 1. Action: Exhaust Flood Lights to reduce the cost of the next Day card you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Twila Katherine Price, Lost in a Dream
text: If it is Night, Twila Katherine Price gains: "Action: Exhaust Twila Katherine Price and pay 2 to resolve the effect of the story card to which Twila Katherine Price is committed."

name: Dream Diary
text: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains the Dreamer subtype. If attached character is a unique character, it does not exhaust to commit to stories.

name: Gregory Gry, Muckraker
text: If it is Day, Gregory Gry gains Willpower and Toughness +2. If there are no Dreamer characters in play, Gregory Gry gains: "Action: Pay 1 to ready Gregory Gry."

name: Clover Club Deck
text: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust Clover Club Deck and pay 2 to look at an opponent's hand. Choose and discard one card from that hand. Then, that player draws one card.

name: Beings of Ib
text: Lower the cost to play Bokrug by 1 (to a minimum of 1). If you control a single Ancient One character, count its skill and icons at any story to which Beings of Ib is committed.

name: Everlasting Night
text: Raise the cost for opponents to play Day cards by 1. Action: Exhaust Everlasting Night to reduce the cost of the next Night card you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Sweet Dreams
text: Play only if it is Night. Action: Until the end of the phase, T icons do not protect characters from insanity.

name: Nightmares!
text: Play only if it is Night. Action: Choose a character. That character goes insane, if able. Otherwise, return it to the top of its owner's deck.

name: Puj-Dunk, Gug Chieftain
text: Toughness +2. Response: After Puj-Dunk is wounded, put a Gug character into play from your hand.

name: Twilight Gate
text: Action: Choose a non-Ancient One character card attached to one of your domains as a resource. Put that card into play under your control. If that character is still in play at the end of the phase, attach it to any of your domains as a resource.

name: Twilight Cannibal
text: Toughness +1. If it is Day, sacrifice Twilight Cannibal.

name: Dhole Tunnel
text: Action: Sacrifice Dhole Tunnel to choose a story card. Until the end of the phase, characters do not exhaust to commit to that story.

name: Furtive Zoog
text: If it is Day, Furtive Zoog gains I. If it is Night, Furtive Zoog gains T. Response: After you drain a domain to which Furtive Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Furtive Zoog from that domain and put it into play.

name: Twilight Ritual
text: Action: Until the end of the phase, treat all Day and all Night cards currently in play as if their text boxes were blank. Then, draw a card.

name: The Day Dreamer
text: Day. It is Day. After The Day Dreamer comes into play, destroy all Night cards. Action: Pay 2 to put The Day Dreamer into play from your hand. If The Day Dreamer is still in play at the end of the phase, sacrifice it.

name: Dreamlands Wanderer
text: Night. It is Night. After Dreamlands Wanderer comes into play, destroy all Day cards. Action: Pay 2 to put Dreamlands Wanderer into play from your hand. If Dreamlands Wanderer is still in play at the end of the phase, sacrifice it.

name: The Rays of Dawn, Cleansing Light
text: Day.. It is Day. After The Rays of Dawn comes into play, destroy all Night cards. Each non-unique character loses a T icon.

name: The Setting Sun, The Light Fails
text: Night.. It is Night. After The Setting Sun comes into play, destroy all Day cards. Each non-unique character loses an I icon.

name: The Captain, Dreamlands Navigator
text: Heroic. Willpower. Action: if it is Day, pay 2 to choose a story. Until the end of the phase, count The Captain's icons and skill towards that story without committing him to that story.

name: Prize Pistol
text: Attach to an [Agency] character. Attached character gains C. Action: Exhaust Prize Pistol and pay 1 to choose and wound one character with lower skill than the number of C icons attached character has.

name: Daybreak!
text: Day. Action: Destroy all Night cards in play and attach Daybreak! to a story card. (Counts as an Environment support card with the text: "Day. It is Day. T struggles do not resolve at this story.")

name: Obsessive Insomniac
text: Loyal. Action: Discard a resource from a domain you control to ready Obsessive Insomniac. Action: Exhaust Obsessive Insomniac to draw one card.

name: Dreamlore Documents
text: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust Dreamlore Documents to choose one subtype other than Dreamer or Dreamlands. Until the end of the phase, cards of the chosen subtype cost an additional 2 to play from their owner's hand.

name: Clover Club Regular
text: Opponents play with the top card of their deck revealed. Response: After an opponent places a success token at a story, that player draws one card.

name: Forcibly Removed
text: Action: Look at one opponent's hand and discard up to 2 non-unique character cards from that hand. Then, that player draws a card for each character discarded in this manner.

name: Day of the Deep Ones
text: Action: Sacrifice one Deep One character to destroy all Day cards in play. Then, attach Day of the Deep Ones to a Deep One character. Counts as an Attachment Support card with the text: "Night. It is Night."

name: Curse of Darkness
text: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of a Day card just played. Then, shuffle that card back into its owner's deck.

name: The Seventy Steps, Of Light Slumber
text: If a player has no story cards in his won story pile, that player's characters enter play exhausted. Action: Pay 2 to sacrifice The Seventy Steps.

name: The Seven Hundred Steps, Of Deeper Slumber
text: If a player has 2 story cards in his won story pile, that player's characters enter play exhausted. Action: Pay 2 to sacrifice The Seven Hundred Steps.

name: Enraged Gug
text: Toughness +1. Response: After Enraged Gug is wounded, choose and wound one character with a C icon.

name: City of Gugs, Beneath the Earth
text: If it is Day, Gug characters you control gain Toughness +1.

name: Ghoul Spawn
text: Action: Sacrifice Ghoul Spawn to put one Ghoul character into play from your hand. Use this effect only if it is Night.

name: Back From the Dead
text: Play only if it is Night. Action: Choose a unique non-Ancient One character in any discard pile, and put it into play under your control with Back From the Dead attached. (Counts as an Attachment Support card with the text: "If Back From the Dead leaves play or if it becomes Day, sacrifice attached character.")

name: Secretive Zoog
text: Response: After you drain a domain to which Secretive Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Secretive Zoog from that domain and put it into play to choose one other Zoog card you control. Attach that card to any of your domains.

name: The Enchanted Wood
text: If you control more Dreamlands support cards than each individual opponent, T icons do not protect characters from insanity.

name: Kaman-Thah, Priest of the Dreamlands
text: Toughness +1. If you control Nasht, Kaman-Thah gains +3 skill, and CA.

name: Nasht, Priest of the Dreamlands
text: Toughness +1. If you control Kaman-Thah, Nasht gains +3 skill and TI.

name: Slime Mold
text: Action: Sacrifice Slime Mold to wound all wounded characters.

name: Nathaniel Elton, Questing for Cathuria
text: Heroic. Toughness +1. Action: Exhaust a Heroic character you control to choose and exhaust a Villainous character.

name: Night Raid!
text: Disrupt: Cancel the effects of a Night card just played. Then, shuffle that card back into its owner's deck.

name: Dreamlands Scholar
text: Action: Pay 1 and exhaust a Dreamer character to look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Put 1 of those cards in your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Night Class
text: Play only if it is not Day. Action: Put a [Miskatonic] character with at least 1 A icon into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, return that character to your hand if it is still in play.

name: Petty Thief
text: Response: After an opponent draws a card as the result of a card effect, exhaust Petty Thief to discard 1 card at random from that player's hand if that player has more cards in hand than you.

name: Ritual Initiation
text: Action: Choose a unique [Syndicate] character. Until the end of the phase that character gains C, +1 skill, and Toughness +1. Then, you may pay 1 to return Ritual Initiation to your hand.

name: Dreamlands Fanatic
text: Fast. Response: After an opponent's character leaves play, put Dreamlands Fanatic into play from your hand.

name: Midnight Rendezvous
text: Night. Action: Destroy all Day cards, then attach Midnight Rendezvous to a story. Counts as an Environment support card with the text: "Night. It is Night. I struggles do not resolve at this story."

name: The Cavern of Flame, Gateway to the Dreamlands
text: If you control more Dreamlands support cards than any opponent, The Cavern of Flame gains: "Action: Exhaust The Cavern of Flame to choose a non-Dreamer character committed to a story. Ready that character, and remove it from the story."

name: Dream Parasite
text: Response: After a Forced Response is triggered, sacrifice Dream Parasite to trigger that Forced Response again.

name: Laboring Gug
text: Toughness +1. Response: After Laboring Gug is wounded, draw 1 card.

name: Great Stone Circle
text: If it is Night, resolve all C struggles before all T struggles at any story to which a Gug character is committed.

name: Ghoulish Predator
text: Toughness +1. Ghoulish Predator cannot commit to stories while it is Day.

name: Dhole Attack!
text: Action: Choose and destroy a Location support card. Then, put Dhole Attack! into play as a Monster character with 3 skill and TTCC. At the end of the phase, sacrifice Dhole Attack.

name: Ancient Zoog
text: Response: After you drain a domain to which Ancient Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Ancient Zoog from that domain and attach it to a non-Zoog character. (Counts as an Attachment Zoog support card with the text: "Attached character gains the Dreamer subtype and A.")

name: Zoog Burrow
text: Response: After you draw a Zoog character, exhaust Zoog Burrow to reveal that card to each opponent and attach it as a resource to one of your domains. Then, you may immediately drain that domain to draw 1 card.

name: The Night, Darkness Incarnate
text: Villainous. If it is Night, reduce the cost to play The Night by 3. If it is Night, treat all exhausted non-unique, non-Night, characters as if their printed text boxes were blank.

name: Dream Dagger
text: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains C. (TCCA instead if attached character is a Dreamer.) Action: Pay 1 to unattach Dream Dagger, and attach it to a different character you control.

name: Blasphemous Dreams
text: If it is Night, reduce the cost to play Blasphemous Dreams by 2. Action: Ready a Dreamer character you control to choose and exhaust a non-Dreamer character.

name: Assist Dreamer
text: If it is Night, reduce the cost to play Assist Dreamer by 2. Action: Choose and ready a unique character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains the Dreamer subtype and AAA.

name: John Henry Price, Cold and Paternal
text: Reduce the cost for you to play Attachment support cards on John Henry Price by 1. Response: After you play an Attachment support card on John Henry Price, draw 1 card.

name: Price Manor
text: Action: Exhaust Price Manor to take the topmost Attachment support card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

name: Randolph Carter, King of Ilek-Vad
text: Heroic. Willpower. Randolph Carter gains Toughness +1 for each Dreamlands support card you control. Disrupt: Pay 3 to resolve an additional skill check (immediately after the initial skill check) at any story to which Randolph Carter is committed. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Arcane Translation
text: Disrupt: Play when you would draw cards from your deck. Instead of drawing cards from your deck, draw the same number of cards from the top of your discard pile. Then, place Arcane Translation at the bottom of your deck.

name: King Kuranes, Ruler of Celephais
text: Willpower. Response: After you succeed at a story at which King Kuranes was committed, choose a Dreamlands support card controlled by an opponent and take control of that card.

name: The Back Room
text: Each player draws 1 additional card during his standard draw phase action.

name: Cerenerian Deep One
text: Reduce the cost to play Cerenerian Deep One by 1 for each Dreamlands support card you control.

name: Dark Quagmire
text: Attach Dark Quagmire to a story card. Dark Quagmire cannot be chosen as the only target of a triggered effect. At the beginning of each player's story phase, that player must remove one of his success tokens from attached story.

name: Victoria's Protege
text: Forced Response: After Victoria's Protege comes into play, return 1 [Hastur] character to its owner's hand.

name: Devolution
text: Action: Choose an opponent's character. That opponent must choose and exhaust another character he or she controls. Then, wound the character with the lower skill.

name: Guardian of the Key
text: Loyal. Disrupt: Exhaust Guardian of the Key to cancel 1 effect that chooses a support card as a target.

name: The Silver Key, Unlocking the way
text: Attach to a story card. Readied characters cannot commit to attached story. Exhausted characters can commit to attached story. Forced Response: After a character commits to attached story, ready that character.

name: Ghoulish Hag
text: If it is Day, sacrifice Ghoulish Hag. If it is Night, Ghoulish Hag can be played from your discard pile as if it were in your hand.

name: The Vale of Pnath
text: If you control more Dreamlands locations than each opponent, The Vale of Pnath gains: "Disrupt: When an icon struggle resolves, exhaust The Vale of Pnath to cancel the game effects of that struggle."

name: Halflings of D'haz
text: Halflings of D'haz can only commit to stories on your turn. The loser of any C struggle in which Halflings of D'haz participated must receive an additional wound for each icon by which the struggle was lost.

name: Curious Zoog
text: Response: After you drain a domain to which Curious Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Curious Zoog from that domain and return it to your hand to look at the top card of each player's deck. You may discard those cards or put them back on top of their owner's decks.

name: Cryptic Writings
text: Attach to a non-Ancient One character. Attached character cannot trigger its effects.

name: Guardian Pillar
text: If you control more Dreamlands support cards than any opponent, you may exhaust Guardian Pillar to commit it to a story as a character with 4 skill, TCCC, and Invulnerability.

name: The Book of Black Stones
text: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust the Book of Black Stones to discard the top card of each player's deck.

name: Dreamlands Eclipse
text: The player who controls the fewest Dreamlands support cards must play with the top card of his deck revealed.

name: Sleep Therapist
text: Action: Exhaust Sleep Therapist to choose and ready a Dreamer character.

name: Behind Bars
text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot commit to stories.

name: The Woman of His Dreams
text: Response: After The Woman of His Dreams is readied as the result of an A struggle, choose and ready a non-Ancient One character.

name: Horrid Dreams
text: Action: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck. Then, that player must choose and sacrifice a card from the same faction, if able.

name: Clover Club Executive
text: Forced Response: After Clover Club Executive enters play, the player with the most cards in hand must randomly discard 2 cards from his hand. (In case of tie, no cards are discarded.)

name: Clover Club Cardroom, Parlor of Higher Stakes
text: Response: After a player wins a story card, sacrifice Clover Club Cardroom to have each player shuffle his hand back into his deck. Then, each player draws 6 cards.

name: Princess Zura, The Flower of the Charnel Garden
text: Villainous. Response: After an opponent's character leaves play, ready Princess Zura. Then, draw a card.

name: In an Unmarked Grave
text: Action: Each player sacrifices all non-unique characters he controls.

name: Ward Phillips, Obsessed Recluse
text: Loyal. After an opponent wins a story card, sacrifice Ward Phillips. Disrupt: Exhaust Ward Phillips to cancel the effects of a character ability that has just been triggered.

name: Dreams Within Dreams
text: Action: Choose a non-conspiracy story card in play, and exchange that story card with a non-conspiracy story card in your won story pile. (Any success tokens remain in place at the newly placed story card.)

name: Wandering Gug
text: Toughness +1. Response: After Wandering Gug is wounded, discard the top card from any player's deck.

name: Ascension to Zura
text: Action: Discard a wound token from an exhausted Gug character you control to ready that character.

name: Shuggob, Ghoul Sage
text: Villainous. Night. It is Night. Discard all Day cards from play after you play Shuggob from your hand.

name: Mi-Go Dreams
text: Action: Return any number of Mi-Go characters from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Inconspicuous Zoog
text: Response: After you drain a domain to which Inconspicuous Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Inconspicuous Zoog from that domain and attach it to a story card. (Count as an Attachment Zoog support card with the text: "Count Inconspicuous Zoog's skill and icons at attached story each time it resolves. If you win this story, return Inconspicuous Zoog to your hand.")

name: Basilisk
text: Fast. Toughness +3. Forced Response: At the end of your turn, deal 2 wounds to all other characters you control or sacrifice Basilisk.

name: Richard Upton Pickman, Venerable Ghoul
text: Richard Upton Pickman gains the icons of each attached Ghoul character. If Richard Upton Pickman would be wounded, you may discard an attached Ghoul character instead. Action: Pay 2 to attach a Ghoul character to Richard Upton Pickman from your hand or discard pile.

name: Moon-Beast Captain
text: If you control more Dreamlands support cards than any opponent, reduce the cost to play Moon-Beast Captain by 2.

name: Moon-Beast Galley
text: If you control more Dreamlands support cards than any opponent, ready all Dreamer characters at the beginning of each player's turn.

name: The Sleep of the Dead
text: Play at the end of your story phase. Action: Choose up to 2 characters. Those characters do not refresh during the next refresh phase.

name: Agency Bodyguard
text: Toughness +1. Disrupt: Exhaust Agency Bodyguard to cancel 1 wound dealt to a unique character.

name: The White Ship, Smooth and Silent
text: Action: Exhaust The White Ship to choose a character you control that is committed to a story. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +2 skill and Fast. If you succeed at that story, search your deck for a Dreamlands support card, reveal it to your opponent, and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Twila Katherine Price, Queen of Unknown-Kadath
text: Response: After you succeed at a story at which Twila Katherine Price is committed, exhaust Twila Katherine Price to look at each opponent's hand, and choose 1 card to discard from those hands.

name: Dreaming of the Past
text: Attach to a story card. Disrupt: If an opponent would claim his fifth success token on this story, place Dreaming of the Past on the bottom of your deck to prevent that success token from being claimed.

name: Gregory Gry, Shadow of his Former Self
text: Action: Exhaust Gregory Gry to shuffle the top 2 cards of any discard pile back into their owner's deck.

name: Raking the Pot
text: Response: After an opponent plays a character, that opponent must immediately drain another domain or return that character to his hand.

name: Mnomquah's Serpent
text: Play only if it is Night. Action: Attach Mnomquah's Serpent to a character. Count as a Curse attachment with the text: "Night. Attached character cannot commit to stories. Attached character's controller must randomly discard a card from his hand at the end of each of his turns."

name: Mnomquah, The Moon God
text: Villainous. Toughness +2. If it is Night, Mnomquah is unaffected by all story and conspiracy card effects. Response: After you succeed at a story card to which Mnomquah is committed, discard an opponent's success token from that story.

name: Keeper of Dreams, Mind Breaker
text: Villainous. Action: Exhaust Keeper of Dreams to choose a character. That character loses Willpower until the end of the phase unless its controller discards 1 card at random from his hand.

name: Magah Bird
text: Fast. Response: After Magah Bird enters play, search your deck for a character named Magah Bird and put it into play.

name: Gug Sentinel
text: Toughness +1. Response: After Gug Sentinel is wounded, choose and exhaust 1 opponent's character.

name: The Tower of Koth, Passage to the Underworld
text: Response: After you succeed at a story, exhaust The Tower of Koth to choose and wound 1 Monster character.

name: Dhole Ant-Lion
text: Toughness +5. Dhole Ant-Lion does not exhaust to commit to story cards if it has no wounds. Forced Response: At the end of each story phase, sacrifice 1 character you control or wound Dhole Ant-Lion.

name: Dark Contagion
text: Attach to a character. Response: After a [Shub-Niggurath] character you control is wounded, wound attached character.

name: Stealthy Zoog
text: Response: After you drain a domain to which Stealthy Zoog is attached as a resource, unattach Stealthy Zoog from that domain and attach it to a story. (Counts as an Attachment Zoog support card with the text: "If attached story is won, its effect must resolve.")

name: The Cats of Ulthar
text: Fast. Action: During the Story phase, pay 3 to put The Cats of Ulthar into play from your hand, committed to a story of your choice. Action: Pay 1 to destroy 1 Zoog card in play. Then, return The Cats of Ulthar to your hand.

name: Nyarlathotep, The Black Pharaoh
text: Villainous. Toughness +2. During the resource phase, if an opponent wishes to attach a resource to a domain, the resource must be chosen at random from his hand. (Choose the domain first, then randomly determine the resource.)

name: The Light Side of the Moon
text: If it is Day, the cost to play The Light Side of the Moon is 0. Response: After an opponent wins a story card, each player chooses up to 3 characters he controls. Shuffle all characters not chosen back into their owner's decks.

name: The Dark Side of the Moon
text: If it is Night, the cost to play The Dark Side of the Moon is 0. Response: After an opponent wins a story card, each player chooses a character controlled by one of his opponents. Shuffle all chosen characters back into their owner's decks.

name: Unknown Kadath, Home of the Other Gods
text: Action: Exhaust Unknown Kadath to choose an opponent. That opponent must choose a Day or Night card in your discard pile and return it to your hand.
